**Example 1: 成功**

 

Input: 

```
tccli iss DescribeDeviceRegion --cli-unfold-argument ```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Data": [
            {
                "Label": "上海一区",
                "Value": "12345678-abcd-efgh-ijkl-1234567890abcd"
            }
        ],
        "RequestId": "fe0b2087-ba34-458d-9b0c-2c011189ce86"
    }
}
```
